85/* Initializes the server options to their default values. */
86
87void
88initialize_server_options(ServerOptions *options)
89{
90 memset(options, 0, sizeof(*options));
91
92 /* Portable-specific options */
93 options->use_pam = -1;
94
95 /* Standard Options */
96 options->num_ports = 0;
97 options->ports_from_cmdline = 0;
98 options->queued_listen_addrs = NULL;
99 options->num_queued_listens = 0;
100 options->listen_addrs = NULL;
101 options->num_listen_addrs = 0;
102 options->address_family = -1;
103 options->routing_domain = NULL;
104 options->num_host_key_files = 0;
105 options->num_host_cert_files = 0;
106 options->host_key_agent = NULL;
107 options->pid_file = NULL;
108 options->login_grace_time = -1;
109 options->permit_root_login = PERMIT_NOT_SET;
110 options->ignore_rhosts = -1;
111 options->ignore_root_rhosts = -1;
112 options->ignore_user_known_hosts = -1;
113 options->print_motd = -1;
114 options->print_lastlog = -1;
115 options->x11_forwarding = -1;
116 options->x11_display_offset = -1;
117 options->x11_use_localhost = -1;
118 options->permit_tty = -1;
119 options->permit_user_rc = -1;
120 options->xauth_location = NULL;
121 options->strict_modes = -1;
122 options->tcp_keep_alive = -1;
123 options->log_facility = SYSLOG_FACILITY_NOT_SET;
124 options->log_level = SYSLOG_LEVEL_NOT_SET;
125 options->hostbased_authentication = -1;
126 options->hostbased_uses_name_from_packet_only = -1;
127 options->hostbased_key_types = NULL;
128 options->hostkeyalgorithms = NULL;
129 options->pubkey_authentication = -1;
130 options->pubkey_key_types = NULL;
131 options->kerberos_authentication = -1;
132 options->kerberos_or_local_passwd = -1;
133 options->kerberos_ticket_cleanup = -1;
134#if defined(AFS) || defined(KRB5)
135 options->kerberos_tgt_passing = -1;
136#endif
137#ifdef AFS
138 options->afs_token_passing = -1;
139#endif
140 options->kerberos_get_afs_token = -1;
141 options->gss_authentication=-1;
142 options->gss_cleanup_creds = -1;
143 options->gss_strict_acceptor = -1;
144 options->password_authentication = -1;
145 options->kbd_interactive_authentication = -1;
146 options->challenge_response_authentication = -1;
147 options->permit_empty_passwd = -1;
148 options->permit_user_env = -1;
149 options->permit_user_env_whitelist = NULL;
150 options->compression = -1;
151 options->rekey_limit = -1;
152 options->rekey_interval = -1;
153 options->allow_tcp_forwarding = -1;
154 options->allow_streamlocal_forwarding = -1;
155 options->allow_agent_forwarding = -1;
156 options->num_allow_users = 0;
157 options->num_deny_users = 0;
158 options->num_allow_groups = 0;
159 options->num_deny_groups = 0;
160 options->ciphers = NULL;
161#ifdef WITH_LDAP_PUBKEY
162 /* XXX dirty */
163 options->lpk.ld = NULL;
164 options->lpk.on = -1;
165 options->lpk.servers = NULL;
166 options->lpk.u_basedn = NULL;
167 options->lpk.g_basedn = NULL;
168 options->lpk.binddn = NULL;
169 options->lpk.bindpw = NULL;
170 options->lpk.sgroup = NULL;
171 options->lpk.filter = NULL;
172 options->lpk.fgroup = NULL;
173 options->lpk.l_conf = NULL;
174 options->lpk.tls = -1;
175 options->lpk.b_timeout.tv_sec = -1;
176 options->lpk.s_timeout.tv_sec = -1;
177 options->lpk.flags = FLAG_EMPTY;
178 options->lpk.pub_key_attr = NULL;
179#endif
180 options->macs = NULL;
181 options->kex_algorithms = NULL;
182 options->ca_sign_algorithms = NULL;
183 options->fwd_opts.gateway_ports = -1;
184 options->fwd_opts.streamlocal_bind_mask = (mode_t)-1;
185 options->fwd_opts.streamlocal_bind_unlink = -1;
186 options->num_subsystems = 0;
187 options->max_startups_begin = -1;
188 options->max_startups_rate = -1;
189 options->max_startups = -1;
190 options->max_authtries = -1;
191 options->max_sessions = -1;
192 options->banner = NULL;
193 options->use_dns = -1;
194 options->client_alive_interval = -1;
195 options->client_alive_count_max = -1;
196 options->num_authkeys_files = 0;
197 options->num_accept_env = 0;
198 options->num_setenv = 0;
199 options->permit_tun = -1;
200 options->permitted_opens = NULL;
201 options->permitted_listens = NULL;
202 options->adm_forced_command = NULL;
203 options->chroot_directory = NULL;
204 options->authorized_keys_command = NULL;
205 options->authorized_keys_command_user = NULL;
206 options->revoked_keys_file = NULL;
207 options->trusted_user_ca_keys = NULL;
208 options->authorized_principals_file = NULL;
209 options->authorized_principals_command = NULL;
210 options->authorized_principals_command_user = NULL;
211 options->ip_qos_interactive = -1;
212 options->ip_qos_bulk = -1;
213 options->version_addendum = NULL;
214 options->fingerprint_hash = -1;
215 options->disable_forwarding = -1;
216 options->expose_userauth_info = -1;
217 options->none_enabled = -1;
218 options->tcp_rcv_buf_poll = -1;
219 options->hpn_disabled = -1;
220 options->hpn_buffer_size = -1;
221}
222
223/* Returns 1 if a string option is unset or set to "none" or 0 otherwise. */
224static int
225option_clear_or_none(const char *o)
226{
227 return o == NULL || strcasecmp(o, "none") == 0;
228}
229
230static void
231assemble_algorithms(ServerOptions *o)
232{
233 char *all_cipher, *all_mac, *all_kex, *all_key, *all_sig;
234 int r;
235
236 all_cipher = cipher_alg_list(',', 0);
237 all_mac = mac_alg_list(',');
238 all_kex = kex_alg_list(',');
239 all_key = sshkey_alg_list(0, 0, 1, ',');
240 all_sig = sshkey_alg_list(0, 1, 1, ',');
241#define ASSEMBLE(what, defaults, all) \
242 do { \
243 if ((r = kex_assemble_names(&o->what, defaults, all)) != 0) \
244 fatal("%s: %s: %s", __func__, #what, ssh_err(r)); \
245 } while (0)
246 ASSEMBLE(ciphers, KEX_SERVER_ENCRYPT, all_cipher);
247 ASSEMBLE(macs, KEX_SERVER_MAC, all_mac);
248 ASSEMBLE(kex_algorithms, KEX_SERVER_KEX, all_kex);
249 ASSEMBLE(hostkeyalgorithms, KEX_DEFAULT_PK_ALG, all_key);
250 ASSEMBLE(hostbased_key_types, KEX_DEFAULT_PK_ALG, all_key);
251 ASSEMBLE(pubkey_key_types, KEX_DEFAULT_PK_ALG, all_key);
252 ASSEMBLE(ca_sign_algorithms, SSH_ALLOWED_CA_SIGALGS, all_sig);
253#undef ASSEMBLE
254 free(all_cipher);
255 free(all_mac);
256 free(all_kex);
257 free(all_key);
258 free(all_sig);
259}
260
261static void
262array_append2(const char *file, const int line, const char *directive,
263 char ***array, int **iarray, u_int *lp, const char *s, int i)
264{
265
266 if (*lp >= INT_MAX)
267 fatal("%s line %d: Too many %s entries", file, line, directive);
268
269 if (iarray != NULL) {
270 *iarray = xrecallocarray(*iarray, *lp, *lp + 1,
271 sizeof(**iarray));
272 (*iarray)[*lp] = i;
273 }
274
275 *array = xrecallocarray(*array, *lp, *lp + 1, sizeof(**array));
276 (*array)[*lp] = xstrdup(s);
277 (*lp)++;
278}
279
280static void
281array_append(const char *file, const int line, const char *directive,
282 char ***array, u_int *lp, const char *s)
283{
284 array_append2(file, line, directive, array, NULL, lp, s, 0);
285}
286
287void
288servconf_add_hostkey(const char *file, const int line,
289 ServerOptions *options, const char *path, int userprovided)
290{
291 char *apath = derelativise_path(path);
292
293 array_append2(file, line, "HostKey",
294 &options->host_key_files, &options->host_key_file_userprovided,
295 &options->num_host_key_files, apath, userprovided);
296 free(apath);
297}
298
299void
300servconf_add_hostcert(const char *file, const int line,
301 ServerOptions *options, const char *path)
302{
303 char *apath = derelativise_path(path);
304
305 array_append(file, line, "HostCertificate",
306 &options->host_cert_files, &options->num_host_cert_files, apath);
307 free(apath);
308}
309
310void
311fill_default_server_options(ServerOptions *options)
312{
313 /* needed for hpn socket tests */
314 int sock;
315 int socksize;
316 socklen_t socksizelen = sizeof(int);
317
318 /* Portable-specific options */
319 if (options->use_pam == -1)
320 options->use_pam = 0;
321
322 /* Standard Options */
323 u_int i;
324
325 if (options->num_host_key_files == 0) {
326 /* fill default hostkeys */
327 servconf_add_hostkey("[default]", 0, options,
328 _PATH_HOST_RSA_KEY_FILE, 0);
329 servconf_add_hostkey("[default]", 0, options,
330 _PATH_HOST_ECDSA_KEY_FILE, 0);
331 servconf_add_hostkey("[default]", 0, options,
332 _PATH_HOST_ED25519_KEY_FILE, 0);
333#ifdef WITH_XMSS
334 servconf_add_hostkey("[default]", 0, options,
335 _PATH_HOST_XMSS_KEY_FILE, 0);
336#endif /* WITH_XMSS */
337 }
338 /* No certificates by default */
339 if (options->num_ports == 0)
340 options->ports[options->num_ports++] = SSH_DEFAULT_PORT;
341 if (options->address_family == -1)
342 options->address_family = AF_UNSPEC;
343 if (options->listen_addrs == NULL)
344 add_listen_addr(options, NULL, NULL, 0);
345 if (options->pid_file == NULL)
346 options->pid_file = xstrdup(_PATH_SSH_DAEMON_PID_FILE);
347 if (options->login_grace_time == -1)
348 options->login_grace_time = 120;
349 if (options->permit_root_login == PERMIT_NOT_SET)
350 options->permit_root_login = PERMIT_NO_PASSWD;
351 if (options->ignore_rhosts == -1)
352 options->ignore_rhosts = 1;
353 if (options->ignore_root_rhosts == -1)
354 options->ignore_root_rhosts = options->ignore_rhosts;
355 if (options->ignore_user_known_hosts == -1)
356 options->ignore_user_known_hosts = 0;
357 if (options->print_motd == -1)
358 options->print_motd = 1;
359 if (options->print_lastlog == -1)
360 options->print_lastlog = 1;
361 if (options->x11_forwarding == -1)
362 options->x11_forwarding = 0;
363 if (options->x11_display_offset == -1)
364 options->x11_display_offset = 10;
365 if (options->x11_use_localhost == -1)
366 options->x11_use_localhost = 1;
367 if (options->xauth_location == NULL)
368 options->xauth_location = xstrdup(_PATH_XAUTH);
369 if (options->permit_tty == -1)
370 options->permit_tty = 1;
371 if (options->permit_user_rc == -1)
372 options->permit_user_rc = 1;
373 if (options->strict_modes == -1)
374 options->strict_modes = 1;
375 if (options->tcp_keep_alive == -1)
376 options->tcp_keep_alive = 1;
377 if (options->log_facility == SYSLOG_FACILITY_NOT_SET)
378 options->log_facility = SYSLOG_FACILITY_AUTH;
379 if (options->log_level == SYSLOG_LEVEL_NOT_SET)
380 options->log_level = SYSLOG_LEVEL_INFO;
381 if (options->hostbased_authentication == -1)
382 options->hostbased_authentication = 0;
383 if (options->hostbased_uses_name_from_packet_only == -1)
384 options->hostbased_uses_name_from_packet_only = 0;
385 if (options->pubkey_authentication == -1)
386 options->pubkey_authentication = 1;
387 if (options->kerberos_authentication == -1)
388 options->kerberos_authentication = 0;
389 if (options->kerberos_or_local_passwd == -1)
390 options->kerberos_or_local_passwd = 1;
391 if (options->kerberos_ticket_cleanup == -1)
392 options->kerberos_ticket_cleanup = 1;
393#if defined(AFS) || defined(KRB5)
394 if (options->kerberos_tgt_passing == -1)
395 options->kerberos_tgt_passing = 0;
396#endif
397#ifdef AFS
398 if (options->afs_token_passing == -1)
399 options->afs_token_passing = 0;
400#endif
401 if (options->kerberos_get_afs_token == -1)
402 options->kerberos_get_afs_token = 0;
403 if (options->gss_authentication == -1)
404 options->gss_authentication = 0;
405 if (options->gss_cleanup_creds == -1)
406 options->gss_cleanup_creds = 1;
407 if (options->gss_strict_acceptor == -1)
408 options->gss_strict_acceptor = 1;
409 if (options->password_authentication == -1)
410 options->password_authentication = 1;
411 if (options->kbd_interactive_authentication == -1)
412 options->kbd_interactive_authentication = 0;
413 if (options->challenge_response_authentication == -1)
414 options->challenge_response_authentication = 1;
415 if (options->permit_empty_passwd == -1)
416 options->permit_empty_passwd = 0;
417 if (options->permit_user_env == -1) {
418 options->permit_user_env = 0;
419 options->permit_user_env_whitelist = NULL;
420 }
421 if (options->compression == -1)
422 options->compression = COMP_DELAYED;
423 if (options->rekey_limit == -1)
424 options->rekey_limit = 0;
425 if (options->rekey_interval == -1)
426 options->rekey_interval = 0;
427 if (options->allow_tcp_forwarding == -1)
428 options->allow_tcp_forwarding = FORWARD_ALLOW;
429 if (options->allow_streamlocal_forwarding == -1)
430 options->allow_streamlocal_forwarding = FORWARD_ALLOW;
431 if (options->allow_agent_forwarding == -1)
432 options->allow_agent_forwarding = 1;
433 if (options->fwd_opts.gateway_ports == -1)
434 options->fwd_opts.gateway_ports = 0;
435 if (options->max_startups == -1)
436 options->max_startups = 100;
437 if (options->max_startups_rate == -1)
438 options->max_startups_rate = 30; /* 30% */
439 if (options->max_startups_begin == -1)
440 options->max_startups_begin = 10;
441 if (options->max_authtries == -1)
442 options->max_authtries = DEFAULT_AUTH_FAIL_MAX;
443 if (options->max_sessions == -1)
444 options->max_sessions = DEFAULT_SESSIONS_MAX;
445 if (options->use_dns == -1)
446 options->use_dns = 0;
447 if (options->client_alive_interval == -1)
448 options->client_alive_interval = 0;
449 if (options->client_alive_count_max == -1)
450 options->client_alive_count_max = 3;
451 if (options->num_authkeys_files == 0) {
452 array_append("[default]", 0, "AuthorizedKeysFiles",
453 &options->authorized_keys_files,
454 &options->num_authkeys_files,
455 _PATH_SSH_USER_PERMITTED_KEYS);
456 array_append("[default]", 0, "AuthorizedKeysFiles",
457 &options->authorized_keys_files,
458 &options->num_authkeys_files,
459 _PATH_SSH_USER_PERMITTED_KEYS2);
460 }
461 if (options->permit_tun == -1)
462 options->permit_tun = SSH_TUNMODE_NO;
463 if (options->ip_qos_interactive == -1)
464 options->ip_qos_interactive = IPTOS_DSCP_AF21;
465 if (options->ip_qos_bulk == -1)
466 options->ip_qos_bulk = IPTOS_DSCP_CS1;
467 if (options->version_addendum == NULL)
468 options->version_addendum = xstrdup("");
469
470 if (options->hpn_disabled == -1)
471 options->hpn_disabled = 0;
472
473 if (options->hpn_buffer_size == -1) {
474 /* option not explicitly set. Now we have to figure out */
475 /* what value to use */
476 if (options->hpn_disabled == 1) {
477 options->hpn_buffer_size = CHAN_SES_WINDOW_DEFAULT;
478 } else {
479 /* get the current RCV size and set it to that */
480 /*create a socket but don't connect it */
481 /* we use that the get the rcv socket size */
482 sock = socket(AF_INET, SOCK_STREAM, 0);
483 getsockopt(sock, SOL_SOCKET, SO_RCVBUF,
484 &socksize, &socksizelen);
485 close(sock);
486 options->hpn_buffer_size = socksize;
487 debug ("HPN Buffer Size: %d", options->hpn_buffer_size);
488
489 }
490 } else {
491 /* we have to do this incase the user sets both values in a contradictory */
492 /* manner. hpn_disabled overrrides hpn_buffer_size*/
493 if (options->hpn_disabled <= 0) {
494 if (options->hpn_buffer_size == 0)
495 options->hpn_buffer_size = 1;
496 /* limit the maximum buffer to 64MB */
497 if (options->hpn_buffer_size > 64*1024) {
498 options->hpn_buffer_size = 64*1024*1024;
499 } else {
500 options->hpn_buffer_size *= 1024;
501 }
502 } else
503 options->hpn_buffer_size = CHAN_TCP_WINDOW_DEFAULT;
504 }
505
506#ifdef WITH_LDAP_PUBKEY
507 if (options->lpk.on == -1)
508 options->lpk.on = _DEFAULT_LPK_ON;
509 if (options->lpk.servers == NULL)
510 options->lpk.servers = _DEFAULT_LPK_SERVERS;
511 if (options->lpk.u_basedn == NULL)
512 options->lpk.u_basedn = _DEFAULT_LPK_UDN;
513 if (options->lpk.g_basedn == NULL)
514 options->lpk.g_basedn = _DEFAULT_LPK_GDN;
515 if (options->lpk.binddn == NULL)
516 options->lpk.binddn = _DEFAULT_LPK_BINDDN;
517 if (options->lpk.bindpw == NULL)
518 options->lpk.bindpw = _DEFAULT_LPK_BINDPW;
519 if (options->lpk.sgroup == NULL)
520 options->lpk.sgroup = _DEFAULT_LPK_SGROUP;
521 if (options->lpk.filter == NULL)
522 options->lpk.filter = _DEFAULT_LPK_FILTER;
523 if (options->lpk.tls == -1)
524 options->lpk.tls = _DEFAULT_LPK_TLS;
525 if (options->lpk.b_timeout.tv_sec == -1)
526 options->lpk.b_timeout.tv_sec = _DEFAULT_LPK_BTIMEOUT;
527 if (options->lpk.s_timeout.tv_sec == -1)
528 options->lpk.s_timeout.tv_sec = _DEFAULT_LPK_STIMEOUT;
529 if (options->lpk.l_conf == NULL)
530 options->lpk.l_conf = _DEFAULT_LPK_LDP;
531 if (options->lpk.pub_key_attr == NULL)
532 options->lpk.pub_key_attr = __UNCONST(_DEFAULT_LPK_PUB);
533#endif
534
535 if (options->fwd_opts.streamlocal_bind_mask == (mode_t)-1)
536 options->fwd_opts.streamlocal_bind_mask = 0177;
537 if (options->fwd_opts.streamlocal_bind_unlink == -1)
538 options->fwd_opts.streamlocal_bind_unlink = 0;
539 if (options->fingerprint_hash == -1)
540 options->fingerprint_hash = SSH_FP_HASH_DEFAULT;
541 if (options->disable_forwarding == -1)
542 options->disable_forwarding = 0;
543 if (options->expose_userauth_info == -1)
544 options->expose_userauth_info = 0;
545
546 assemble_algorithms(options);
547
548 /* Turn privilege separation and sandboxing on by default */
549 if (use_privsep == -1)
550 use_privsep = PRIVSEP_ON;
551
552#define CLEAR_ON_NONE(v) \
553 do { \
554 if (option_clear_or_none(v)) { \
555 free(v); \
556 v = NULL; \
557 } \
558 } while(0)
559 CLEAR_ON_NONE(options->pid_file);
560 CLEAR_ON_NONE(options->xauth_location);
561 CLEAR_ON_NONE(options->banner);
562 CLEAR_ON_NONE(options->trusted_user_ca_keys);
563 CLEAR_ON_NONE(options->revoked_keys_file);
564 CLEAR_ON_NONE(options->authorized_principals_file);
565 CLEAR_ON_NONE(options->adm_forced_command);
566 CLEAR_ON_NONE(options->chroot_directory);
567 CLEAR_ON_NONE(options->routing_domain);
568 for (i = 0; i < options->num_host_key_files; i++)
569 CLEAR_ON_NONE(options->host_key_files[i]);
570 for (i = 0; i < options->num_host_cert_files; i++)
571 CLEAR_ON_NONE(options->host_cert_files[i]);
572#undef CLEAR_ON_NONE
573
574 /* Similar handling for AuthenticationMethods=any */
575 if (options->num_auth_methods == 1 &&
576 strcmp(options->auth_methods[0], "any") == 0) {
577 free(options->auth_methods[0]);
578 options->auth_methods[0] = NULL;
579 options->num_auth_methods = 0;
580 }
581}
582
583/* Keyword tokens. */
584typedef enum {
585 sBadOption, /* == unknown option */
586 sUsePAM,
587 sPort, sHostKeyFile, sLoginGraceTime,
588 sPermitRootLogin, sLogFacility, sLogLevel,
589 sKerberosAuthentication, sKerberosOrLocalPasswd, sKerberosTicketCleanup,
590 sKerberosGetAFSToken,
591 sKerberosTgtPassing, sChallengeResponseAuthentication,
592 sPasswordAuthentication, sKbdInteractiveAuthentication,
593 sListenAddress, sAddressFamily,
594 sPrintMotd, sPrintLastLog, sIgnoreRhosts,
595 sX11Forwarding, sX11DisplayOffset, sX11UseLocalhost,
596 sPermitTTY, sStrictModes, sEmptyPasswd, sTCPKeepAlive,
597 sPermitUserEnvironment, sAllowTcpForwarding, sCompression,
598 sRekeyLimit, sAllowUsers, sDenyUsers, sAllowGroups, sDenyGroups,
599 sIgnoreUserKnownHosts, sCiphers, sMacs, sPidFile,
600 sGatewayPorts, sPubkeyAuthentication, sPubkeyAcceptedKeyTypes,
601 sXAuthLocation, sSubsystem, sMaxStartups, sMaxAuthTries, sMaxSessions,
602 sBanner, sUseDNS, sHostbasedAuthentication,
603 sHostbasedUsesNameFromPacketOnly, sHostbasedAcceptedKeyTypes,
604 sHostKeyAlgorithms,
605 sClientAliveInterval, sClientAliveCountMax, sAuthorizedKeysFile,
606 sGssAuthentication, sGssCleanupCreds, sGssStrictAcceptor,
607 sAcceptEnv, sSetEnv, sPermitTunnel,
608 sMatch, sPermitOpen, sPermitListen, sForceCommand, sChrootDirectory,
609 sUsePrivilegeSeparation, sAllowAgentForwarding,
610 sHostCertificate,
611 sRevokedKeys, sTrustedUserCAKeys, sAuthorizedPrincipalsFile,

613 sKexAlgorithms, sCASignatureAlgorithms, sIPQoS, sVersionAddendum,

622#ifdef WITH_LDAP_PUBKEY
623 ,sLdapPublickey, sLdapServers, sLdapUserDN
624 ,sLdapGroupDN, sBindDN, sBindPw, sMyGroup
625 ,sLdapFilter, sForceTLS, sBindTimeout
626 ,sSearchTimeout, sLdapConf ,sLpkPubKeyAttr
627#endif
628} ServerOpCodes;
629
630#define SSHCFG_GLOBAL 0x01 /* allowed in main section of sshd_config */
631#define SSHCFG_MATCH 0x02 /* allowed inside a Match section */
632#define SSHCFG_ALL (SSHCFG_GLOBAL|SSHCFG_MATCH)

791static struct {
792 int val;
793 const char *text;
794} tunmode_desc[] = {
795 { SSH_TUNMODE_NO, "no" },
796 { SSH_TUNMODE_POINTOPOINT, "point-to-point" },
797 { SSH_TUNMODE_ETHERNET, "ethernet" },
798 { SSH_TUNMODE_YES, "yes" },
799 { -1, NULL }
